title: Webinar: How to Stop Python Supply Chain Attacks—and the Expert Tools You Need
description: Python is everywhere in modern software. From machine learning models to production microservices, chances are your code—and your business—depends on Python packages you didn’t write. But in 2025, that trust comes with a serious risk.
